name: Orbital Assault (Mystical_Pidgeon)
description:
Orbital Assault is an arcade flight game inspired by Star Fox.  It currently has many of Star Fox 64's movement options, with some extras sprinkled in.

WASD - Move up/down/left/right

Left/Right arrow - roll (rolling in the direction you are turning will increase your turn speed)

Double tap left/right arrow - barrel roll

Up arrow - boost

Down arrow - brake

Shift - first person camera

Space - fire lasers

C - Hold to lock on to enemies and release to shoot a homing missile

X - release chaff (useful to avoid homing missiles)

Q - Somersault

E - U-turn
